abstract: Mr. Lyons covered science, Congress and the United Nations in nearly 30 years at The New York Times.
snippet: Mr. Lyons covered science, Congress and the United Nations in nearly 30 years at The New York Times.
lead_paragraph: Richard D. Lyons, who covered science, Congress and the United Nations during almost 30 years as a reporter for The New York Times, died on Wednesday at his home in Charleston, S.C. He was 84.

headline.main: Richard D. Lyons, Versatile Times Reporter, Dies at 84
headline.print_headline: Richard D. Lyons, 84, a Versatile Reporter for The Times
